::Grounded::
Grounded now walking into the base is confronted in his mind with a
computer usage.
"Hmmm strange."  He walked ot where Obfucious was. "What is the
meaning of this.  These codes won't work.  They may be able get
through the energy shield but my new organic shiled only reacts to the
codes. That is why I had them specially numbered and incripted. I
understand from your bio that you are the tech master here at Chivtron
and feel free to remain that. My function is defense strictly and that
is what i am doing. Now please don't get jealous that I was able to
get the shields up and protect the base where you couldn't."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Obfucious::
>     He stands out of sight on the bridge watching as people get
their codes.
> He walks off to an auxiliary computer.  "He comes in and thinks he
runs this
> tech operation now.  We'll see about that."  He uses the computer to
take a
> look at the program creating and controlling the shielding codes.
> "Interesting work, I'm almost impressed."  He then sets about a
flurry of
> programing to duplicate the program.  It didn't take very long
because he had
> a template by looking at Grounded's program.  He then created four
codes.  He
> connected himself to the computer and downloaded one code.  With
that done he
> sets up a fire wall so that only he can get at this new program.  He
opens a
> tight band com to Aerotaur, Perplex, and Windlord.  "Please come to my
> position."  He was going to offer a code to Nightlight but he had
seen her
> receive one from Grounded.
